meta-review.comment: Bulwark Falconeer Chronicles lures you in with its beautiful aesthetics and simple game systems, but falls short in combat and long-term gameplay motivation. The settlement building process stands out in an unusual environment, making it cool to watch your city flourish. However, the game lacks the depth and challenge to keep you engaged for very long. It feels like endlessly spinning plates without any real end in sight, and ultimately spreads itself too thin without reaching its full potential. If you're looking for something out of the ordinary, this may be worth a look, but don't expect it to keep you hooked for the long haul.
